text: Hi all, the agency I work for is looking to connect with a developer for its many client projects. General scope of work includes building templates for emails and landing pages, custom form integrations, and possibly websites. This is a remote opportunity with varying hours. If anyone is available and interested please let me know and I can connect you with our account manager.
We can chat here - feel free to send a dm

Hi Tony yes we are available -

We have custom integration expertise - <https://www.HubSpot.com/integrations/makewebbetter>

and we have templates expertise as well -
<https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products?provider=MakeWebBetter>
